metadata.title: CVE-2024-23079 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: JGraphT Core v1.5.2 was discovered to contain a NullPointerException viathe componentorg.jgrapht.alg.util.ToleranceDoubleComparator::compare(Double, Double).NOTE: this is disputed by multiple third parties who believe there was notreasonable evidence to determine the existence of a vulnerability. Thesubmission may have been based on a tool that is not sufficiently robustfor vulnerability identification.

criterions.comment: jgrapht package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
